Methods: Cross-device and platform experiences are now the norm. Mobile First isn't just an idea, it's an imperative for every project.
It's critical people can understand and support your work. My aim is to provide clean code that is easy to interact with.
Code should be written in a way that provides easy ways to add and change features without adding technical debt into the equation.
I work with different areas of the business so we can make informed decisions that bring value to customers.
